Examples

Example 1: Simple navigation bar

You can take a look into the sourcecode of this page to see nav in action. 

<div id="dataview" swa="Navigation FROM ../../data/routes.json"></div>

Sample 2: Use navigation over javascript

The following example creates a link that redirects to the present page. You can add parameters by simply adding an object contianing the attributes and values.


<a href="#" onclick="Navigation.routeTo('present.html', {id: myid});">Ein Linktext</a>

Example 3: Use custom logo and link

By default the component searches and uses a logo file found in the /content directory. It supports the formats *.avif, *.webp and *.png. If you want to use your own logo location or filename use the option logoName which is relative to the /content directory.
By default a click on the logo redirects the user to the /index.html. You can change this behavior with the logoLink option which is relative to the pages url.


var head_navigation_options = {
    logoName: 'mydir/logo',
    logoLink: root + 'mydir/index.html'
};

Example 4: Create a sitemap from navigation data

With the sitemap template you can simply create code for a sitemap.


<div id="dataview" swa="Navigation FROM ../../data/routes.json TEMPLATE sitemap"></div>
